## LinkedList.add() method

Appends a new element with a specified value to the end of a linked list.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
add(element: T): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  element | T | The value of the element to add to the linked list. |

<b>Returns:</b>

this
